import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Character } from '../../interfaces/character.interface'; @Component({ selector: 'dbz-list', templateUrl: './list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./list.component.css'] }) export class ListDBZComponent { @Input() public characterList: Character[] = [] }
